name: Psycho Bandit (prototype)
description:
Psycho bandit is a bullet hell-like game where you alternate between long range and close combat to defeat various bosses as you follow a simple narrative. Beating the stages themselves will unlock different missions to replay the boss fight with different conditions. It also includes a simple rank system that can unlock equippable upgrades. 

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys - Move character

Z - Shoot projectiles

X - Psychic slash attack

Enter - Access pause menu
